Description:
THIS MODIFICATION IS BEING ISSUED TO EXTEND COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT NO. 693JF72150005 TO DECEMBER 30,
2022. A NO COST EXTENSION (NCE) IS NEEDED TO ALLOW LIFECYCLE ENGINEERING (LCE) TO CONTINUE WORKING ON THE PROJECT BECAUSE OF DELAYS ENCOUNTERED WITH OBTAINING EQUIPMENT DATA FROM SOME OF THE CARBON CAPTURE TECHNOLOGY COMPANIES.

THE PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS FOR THE MEASUREMENT OF SHIP UNDERWATER RADIATED NOISE CONTRIBUTIONS IN PRODUCTIVE ECOSYSTEMS TO INFORM ACOUSTIC MODELING EFFORTS, LEAD TO QUIETER VESSELS, AND IMPROVED MANAGEMENT OF UNDERWATER ACOUSTIC DISTRUBANCES.
SUPPORT MARINE BOARD ACTIVITIES AND INITIATIVES
